description: Remove the personal token input section from the UI. Implement pre-configured GitHub token in config to allow public users to collaborate. Token should be stored securely in environment variables for GitHub Pages deployment.

task_name: Update Task Form with All Required Fields
description: Add form inputs for all non-automatable task fields from template schema. Include fields for: task_name
Enhance template-automation.js to automatically populate task_id
priority: and other automatable fields. Ensure validation happens before task creation. Support status normalization and default values from TEMPLATE_CONFIG.

description: Implement parent_task_id functionality to enable subtask creation. Update the UI to show parent-child relationships and support creating subtasks from task detail view. Ensure dependencies work correctly with subtasks.
Add UI controls for defining task dependencies with types (FS
priority: SF) and lag_days. Implement critical path visualization. Validate dependency chains to prevent circular dependencies.

description: Add user name input for public collaborators. Implement comment system on tasks. Add worker assignment without authentication. Enable status updates and progress tracking for all users. Show who made changes and when.
Comprehensive testing of task creation flow with all field types. Verify auto-population of task_id
end_date: and creator. Test validation error messages. Test with various input combinations.

description: Create comprehensive documentation for public users on how to use the task manager. Include examples of creating tasks
priority: and collaborating. Add developer setup guide for GitHub Pages deployment.

description: Setup GitHub Actions workflow to deploy the task manager to GitHub Pages. Configure environment variables for GitHub token. Test public access and collaboration features on live deployment.
Conduct project retrospective to review what went well
end_date: and lessons learned. Document findings and create improvement tasks for next iteration.
